# R Studio

## User interface

The R studio interface has four main panes.

-   **Source pane (top-left)** is where you write you write and execute your code.

-   **Console pane (bottom-left)**This is the interactive

-   **Environment pane (top-right)**

-   **Output pane (bottom-left)**
